topic.title: Introduction
topic.shortdesc: Welcome to the DITA-OT Plugin Test sample project.

body.p: This sample project demonstrates how to use the dita-ot-gradle plugin to:

ul.li: Install plugins from the DITA-OT Plugin Registry

body.p: The project is designed to be used as a template for testing custom DITA-OT plugins or for setting up automated documentation builds.
